identified-content.object.title: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: ABC's Who Wants to Be a Millionaire will stage contest among past big-money winners in final week of current sweep month (S)

block.p: Looking to finish its season with yet another surge, ABC's ''Who Wants to Be a Millionaire'' will stage a contest among past big-money winners in the final week of the current sweep month. Winners who took in at least $250,000 will be back in a tournament starting on May 21. This time each contestant will split his winnings with a charity.

Looking to finish its season with yet another surge, ABC's ''Who Wants to Be a Millionaire'' will stage a contest among past big-money winners in the final week of the current sweep month. Winners who took in at least $250,000 will be back in a tournament starting on May 21. This time each contestant will split his winnings with a charity.
All three millionaire winners will be back, along with four of the five who won $500,000. The rest of the spots will be filled with $250,000 winners.
